Great puzzle game to play solo or with friends. I love that you can make your own test chambers and play them with your friends too. Portal is a fantastic franchise and I would 100% recommend Portal 2 to other players.

Graphics are SUPER GOOD. Game play is amazing along of the story line that is SUPER EASY to understand. This game can also help your brain in making you think and use your surrounding to your advantage with the Aperture Science Hand Held Portal Device TM its way easyer to use along with bugs that got fixed that were in the last game. 10/10

Did you ever hear the Tragedy of Darth Weatley the wise? I thought not. It's not a story the Jedi would tell you. It's a Sith legend. Darth Weatley was a Dark Lord of the Sith, so powerful and so wise he could use the Force to influence the midichlorians to create life... He had such a knowledge of the dark side that he could even keep the ones he cared about from dying. The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. He became so powerful... the only thing he was afraid of was losing his power, which eventually, of course, he did. Unfortunately, he taught his apprentice everything he knew, then his apprentice killed him in his sleep. It's ironic he could save others from death, but not himself.
